Package org.dotplot.ui.views

Holds all GUI relevant classes: complete views, label providers and supporting classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DotPlotFileList DotPlotFileList IFileList used with the plugin.
DotPlotLister DotPlotLister is a view that provides a list of all files to plot.
DotPlotNavigator DotPlotNavigator allows navigating your file-system and to choose files to plot.
DotPlotTable a special table that shows the selected input files to plot.
DotPlotter DotPlotter shows the DotPlot.
MergeView Merge View shows Diff.
TextDiffViewer TextDiffViewer subclasses TextMergeViewer to provide possiblity setting files to show.
 

Package org.dotplot.ui.views Description

Holds all GUI relevant classes: complete views, label providers and supporting classes.
